titleStmt.title: Expositions and sermons upon the ten first chapters of the Gospel of Jesus Christ, according to Matthew. Written by Christopher Blackwood, preacher to a Church of Christ in the city of Dublin in Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Blackwood, Christopher.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills, for Francis Tyton, and John Field, and are to be sold at the Three Daggers, and at the Seven Stars in Fleetstreet.,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in Dr. Williams's Library.
